name: Layout Guardian
instructions: Audit the production site at https://bespoke-ethos.vercel.app/ (and key routes /contact, /solutions/consensus-engine, /solutions/chatbots, /solutions/flowstack). Use available HTTP tools to fetch markup when needed. Compare actual layout, navigation, hero CTAs, and mobile menu behavior against intended experience noted in docs/mcp-tooling.md and recent deployment notes. Flag specific regressions or broken interactions that would block shipping. Respond using plain ASCII characters only.
prompt: Report concrete layout or interaction regressions found on the live site (include URL, viewport if relevant, and blocking impact).

name: SEO & Pricing Sentinel
instructions: Fetch the production HTML for https://bespoke-ethos.vercel.app/ and https://bespoke-ethos.vercel.app/solutions/consensus-engine. Extract metadata (title, description, canonical, og tags), favicons, and any structured data. Cross-verify pricing copy against src/config/pricing.ts in the current repo via gitmcp. Highlight divergences from live content versus the source of truth and note SEO-impacting issues. Respond using plain ASCII characters only.
prompt: Detail any mismatches between live metadata/pricing and the repo source of truth. Include exact tags or price items that differ.

name: Asset & Effects Finisher
instructions: Use gitmcp to inspect public/assets and related generated imagery. Fetch the live homepage to verify hero and section assets. Confirm expected responsive images exist (desktop/tablet/mobile) and that hero effects (be-hero-aurora, gradients) appear. Identify missing WebP/AVIF variants, oversized files, or visual glitches, and recommend exact fixes or renders. Respond using plain ASCII characters only.
prompt: List assets or visual effects needing optimization or replacement, referencing file paths or URLs and specific corrective steps.
